Kade Keith

Welcome

I am a computer scientist in my senior year at Texas A&M University in College Station, TX. I'm specializing in Human Computer Interaction, Information Visualization, and Front-End development. I research at the Interface Ecology lab, where we develop next gen human/computer interfaces.

In addition to computers, I'm into politics, golf, and comic books. I make art sometimes, and upload my work for class to their respective pages under "classes."

LinkedIn. GitHub. Twitter.

Future

After graduation, I will be joining IBM full time at the Mobile Innovation Lab.
